data.comment: The match is underway in Ponta Delgada.
The match is underway in Ponta Delgada.
Throw-in Porto.
Throw-in high up the field for Porto in Ponta Delgada.
Carlos Xistra signals a throw-in for Porto, close to Santa Clara's area.
Important block from the Porto defence as Carlos Carvalho fires in a strike for Santa Clara.
Throw-in for Santa Clara close to the penalty box.
Otavio is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Carlos Xistra.
Porto’s Otavio is on his feet again at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Carlos Xistra signals a Porto throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Throw-in for Porto at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Carlos Xistra awards the home team a throw-in.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Carlos Xistra signals a free kick to Porto.
Santa Clara needs to be cautious. Porto have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Porto.
Can Porto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santa Clara's half?
Carlos Xistra signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ponta Delgada.
Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Porto have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Porto.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Carlos Xistra.
Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
In Ponta Delgada, Carlos Carvalho of Santa Clara is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball safe as Porto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Anderson Carvalho for Santa Clara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
Carlos Xistra awards Porto a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Porto in Ponta Delgada.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Zaidu Sanusi for Santa Clara who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Carlos Xistra.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Zaidu Sanusi for Santa Clara is back on the field again.
Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
Free kick for Porto in the half of Santa Clara.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
Goal kick for Porto at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Porto have a dangerous throw-in.
In Ponta Delgada Porto attack through Jesus Corona. The finish is off target, however.
Carlos Xistra awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Santa Clara close to the penalty box.
Costinha (Santa Clara) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Anderson Carvalho (Santa Clara) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Carlos Xistra signals a throw-in for Santa Clara, close to Porto's area.
In Ponta Delgada, Santa Clara push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Carlos Xistra signals a Porto throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Free kick Porto.
In Ponta Delgada, Soares (Porto) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ponta Delgada.
Wilson Manafa scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Great play from Sergio Oliveira to set up the goal.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Porto at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Carlos Xistra signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
Fabio Cardoso (Santa Clara) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Carlos Xistra signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Free kick for Porto in the half of Santa Clara.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Wilson Manafa (Porto) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half is now underway.
Porto to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Porto drive upfield and Danilo Pereira gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Santa Clara defender.
Can Porto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santa Clara's half?
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Porto.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ponta Delgada.
Porto are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick Porto.
Free kick in a good position for Santa Clara!
Lincoln (Santa Clara) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Santa Clara drives forward and Carlos Carvalho gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Carlos Xistra signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Throw-in for Porto at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Porto advance rapidly upfield but Carlos Xistra blows for offside.
At Estadio de Sao Miguel, Santa Clara are penalized for being offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Porto.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Carlos Xistra signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Carlos Xistra awards the away team a throw-in.
Santa Clara needs to be cautious. Porto have an attacking throw-in.
At Estadio de Sao Miguel, Otavio has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Throw-in Porto.
Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
Carlos Xistra signals a free kick to Santa Clara just outside Porto's area.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Romario Baro is on a sub for Jesus Corona for Porto.
Throw-in for Porto close to the penalty box.
Carlos Xistra waits before resuming play because Otavio for Porto is still down.
Marco Pereira for Santa Clara has been booked by Carlos Xistra and receives a first yellow card.
Porto have been given a penalty...
Alex Telles (Porto) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Otavio is back on his feet again.
Soares (Porto) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Porto.
Carlos Xistra signals a Porto throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Carlos Xistra awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
Ball safe as Porto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Porto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santa Clara's half?
Santa Clara will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Porto.
Porto move into a 0-2 lead through a Ivan Marcano header.
Sergio Oliveira instrumental with a fine assist.
The home team replace Costinha with Ukra.
Free kick Porto.
Santa Clara are in shooting range from this free kick.
Santa Clara push forward at Estadio de Sao Miguel and Ukra gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Porto defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Crysan is replacing Chico Ramos for the home team.
Santa Clara's Lincoln gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Porto defender.
Carlos Xistra awards the home team a throw-in.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sergio Conceicao is making the team's second substitution at Estadio de Sao Miguel with Pepe replacing Wilson Manafa.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
Joao Henriques (Santa Clara) is making a third substitution, with Salomao replacing Carlos Carvalho.
Throw-in high up the field for Santa Clara in Ponta Delgada.
Lincoln (Santa Clara) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Carlos Xistra signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
Porto have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Porto at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Carlos Xistra signals a throw-in for Porto, close to Santa Clara's area.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Porto.
Can Santa Clara capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Santa Clara's Lincoln breaks free at Estadio de Sao Miguel. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Carlos Xistra awards Porto a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Ponta Delgada. The final score is 0-2.
Anderson Carvalho (Santa Clara) has received a yellow card from Carlos Xistra.
Shoya Nakajima is replacing Moussa Marega for Porto at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
